interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Stop Looking For Answers " from Maya Makinami

progression.synopsis: Sensei plans to spend the evening at home with Ami , but finds that Ayane is also staying the night. They describe themselves as the "original Sensei Love Squad", and say that they're not going to let Noriko take him away. They question why they don't have any solid memories of the Nakayama family if Sensei really has connections to them, and how Noriko could possibly have "lost" Sensei for three years. After telling Sensei that there's no one who wants his approval more than them, Ami and Ayane go to sleep.
trivia: Besides some variation depending on Sensei's relationship with Ami, there is also some variation based on whether Sara's She's Always a Woman has been seen.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .16p1.
